Name: Battle Village
About the game: Battle Village is a top down shooter where the player has to control a tank and defend the base from enemies. Battle Village will make you to replay classic mechanics and experience nostalgy feelings. Dedicated to all fans of classic tank arcade games. Protect your headquarters from a variety of enemy tanks. Control the combat vehicle, shoot all the enemies, avoid obstacles, smash and collect bonuses. Many levels, many enemies and many bonuses are waiting for you in Battle Village!
